definition: a relative (i.e. family relation)/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

sentences.english: After that, people call on their relatives, friends and neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 在那之後，人們給親戚，朋友和鄰居拜年。

sentences.english: The old house was soon crowded with relatives and Grandpa's friends.
sentences.chinese: 老屋裏很快擠滿了親戚和爺爺的朋友。

sentences.english: We shouldn't wait for relatives to come to our door before we take care of them.
sentences.chinese: 若論親戚之間，原該不等上門來就該有照應纔是。

sentences.english: Have we not some relatives in those parts, my dear sister?
sentences.chinese: ‘親愛的妹子，我們有些親戚住在那裏嗎？’

sentences.english: I do not like to visit relative for I feel boring.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜好走親戚我以爲那太煩了。

sentences.english: She is related to a European royal house.
sentences.chinese: 她與歐洲的一家王室有親戚關係。

sentences.english: But what about other dinosaur relatives that are alive today?
sentences.chinese: 那麼今日仍倖存的恐龍親戚們是什麼情況呢？

sentences.english: Those two weak boys are distant relations.
sentences.chinese: 那兩個瘦弱的男孩是遠房親戚。

sentences.english: I followed the relative orientation of the finger, see hundred good mother.
sentences.chinese: 我循着這位親戚手指的方向，看到了百良的母親。

sentences.english: You can trust your relatives here with your affairs.
sentences.chinese: 你的事可以託你這兒的親戚辦。

sentences.english: Do you get along with all you relatives?
sentences.chinese: 你跟所有的親戚都處得來嗎？

sentences.english: Many bisexuals don't tell all of their relatives, or their co-workers.
sentences.chinese: 很多雙性戀都不會和他們所有的親戚或者同事說。

sentences.english: They can also get some money from their parents.
sentences.chinese: 當然他們還可以拿到他們父母親戚給的壓歲錢。

sentences.english: She was hostess also to Clifford's occasional aristocratic relations.
sentences.chinese: 她也款待着克利福的不常來的貴族親戚們。

sentences.english: Her relatives leeched her for her money like parasites.
sentences.chinese: 她的親戚像寄生蟲似地“榨取”她的錢財。
飛機不會伴隨著岳家親戚。

definition: daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
relation/relationship/to concern/to affect/to have to do with/guanxi/CL:個|个[ge4]
